summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity for Southern Financial LLC for the period of January 1, 2019, to January 31, 2019. It includes information on account balances, transactions, and portfolio holdings, highlighting significant figures such as total cash balances and investment income. This document contains a financial statement detailing the portfolio holdings, transactions, and account activity for Southern Financial LLC for the period of January 1, 2019, to January 31, 2019. It includes information on cash, fixed income, and equities, as well as various transactions and fees incurred during the period. This document contains financial details related to Southern Financial LLC, including portfolio holdings, cash balances, and transactions for the period of February 1, 2019, to February 28, 2019. It outlines various investment activities, including deposits, withdrawals, and realized gains and losses, while also providing insights into the management of securities and their tax implications. This document contains financial transaction records for Southern Financial LLC from February 1, 2019, to February 28, 2019, detailing various securities transactions, cash withdrawals, and deposits. It includes information on dividends, interest received, and account balances, highlighting significant financial activities related to the account. This document appears to be a financial statement detailing account activities for Southern Financial LLC for the period of March 1, 2019, to March 31, 2019. It includes information on securities transactions, cash withdrawals, and various financial disclosures related to the account management by Pershing LLC.
